subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Deron Williams, who is is averaging 17 points and 8.3 assists while shooting 38.8 percent from the field, said the offense he ran in Utah was a better fit for him than the Nets’ system.
snippet: Deron Williams, who is is averaging 17 points and 8.3 assists while shooting 38.8 percent from the field, said the offense he ran in Utah was a better fit for him than the Nets’ system.
